title: panic: runtime error: slice bounds out of range [:-1]

@du5 can you try running `downloader verify_hashes`? Your snapshots files might be corrupted.

do you mean `downloader torrent_hashes` ? 

Its result is consistent with [torrent_hashes](https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon-snapshot/blob/main/bsc.toml)

@du5 sorry for the confusion, I meant `downloader torrent_hashes --verify`. You can pass the directory of the torrent files with the 'datadir' option (`downloader torrent_hashes --verify --datadir=<data_dir>`) so it verifies them if you have `.torrent` files.
That way you'd be sure if they're corrupt or not.
Probably the reason I ran the script [recompress.sh](https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/blob/devel/cmd/downloader/recompress.sh), now I've deleted the snapshot and started syncing again
